footer.about_text: Kazakhstan Aselsan Engineering is a leading developer and manufacturer of high-tech solutions in defense and security, combining innovation and quality.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: Development of solutions, research and development to meet the needs of industry, domestic and foreign customers, as well as the army and security forces of the Republic of Kazakhstan.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: To become a leading technology company, a center for innovation and technological excellence in defense, security, and the civil sector.

goals.title: Our Goals
items: Development and production of modern high-tech systems, software, and hardware.
Operation within transparency, responsibility, and ethical values.
Innovation and competitiveness with environmental protection and efficient resource use.
Collaboration with global companies to meet the strategic needs of the country.

values.title: Our Values
values.list: Transparency, reliability, excellence, collaboration, and diversity.

policies.quality_text: Satisfying all customer requirements and expectations in the best way, on time, and within budget.
policies.env_text: Efficient resource use, legal compliance, and training personnel in environmental responsibility.
policies.ohs_text: Eliminating hazards, preventing occupational diseases, and maintaining high personnel awareness.

t1.text: KADEX 2010: Presidents of Kazakhstan and Turkey discussed the creation of a joint venture.

t2.text: Signing of a partnership agreement between JSC NC Kazakhstan Engineering and ASELSAN (Turkey).

t3.text: Official establishment of Kazakhstan ASELSAN Engineering LLP.

t4.text: Beginning of plant construction in the SEZ of Astana city.

t5.text: Launch of production. Start of development for communication, EW, and electro-optical systems.

founders.aselsan: Aselsan Elektronik Sanayi ve Ticaret A.Ş. (Turkey)

a100.name: A100
a100.desc: Night vision monocular. 1x magnification, 350g weight, waterproof up to 1m.

t350d.name: T350-D
t350d.desc: Thermal sight/clip-on. 640x480 detector, OLED screen, video recording (32GB).

radio4713.name: 4713 Series
radio4713.desc: Handheld APCO-25/DMR radio. AES-256 encryption, built-in GPS.

ihasavar.name: İHASAVAR
ihasavar.desc: Anti-Drone system. Suppression of UAV control frequencies and GPS/GLONASS signals.

a210.name: A210
a210.desc: Night vision binocular. 1x magnification, 600g weight, powered by a single AA battery.

a360.name: A360
a360.desc: 6x Night vision sight. 1700g weight, focus from 50m to infinity.

a940.name: A940
a940.desc: 1x-4x day sight. 620g weight, 5 reticle brightness levels, 70mm eye relief.

knd525.name: KND 525
knd525.desc: 5-25x56 sniper optical sight. Mil-Dot reticle, parallax adjustment from 25m.

ars12.name: ARS12
ars12.desc: Collimator sight. 2 MOA dot size, 8 brightness levels, weight only 50g.

t360s.name: T360-S
t360s.desc: Thermal sight. 2.2x magnification, uncooled 640x480 detector, 780g weight.

radio4721.name: 4721 Series
radio4721.desc: Mobile APCO-25/DMR radio station. 1.5kg weight, built-in GPS, three power levels.

viper.name: VIPER
viper.desc: Laser target designator. Range up to 20km, built-in digital camera, weight < 6kg.

sharpeye.name: SHARPEYE
sharpeye.desc: Sensor system. Day and thermal cameras, laser rangefinder up to 20km.

sarps.name: SARP-S
sarps.desc: Stabilized weapon station. Armament: 12.7mm NSVT and 7.62mm PKT. Fire on the move.
